alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 4:15AM CDT until April 27 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MARION...NORTHWESTERN FORREST AND NORTHERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 414 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Pine Ridge, or 11 miles northwest of Purvis, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hattiesburg around 425 AM CDT. Oak Grove around 430 AM CDT. West Hattiesburg around 435 AM CDT. Sumrall around 440 AM CDT. Rawls Springs around 445 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
